DOCNAME: CASE OF SALAKHBEKOV AND ABUKAYEV v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court)
JUDGES: Branko Lubarda;Georgios A. Serghides;Pere Pastor Vilanova
TEXT: CARDINAL . In DATE the applicants applied for recalculation of the social benefits they were entitled to as persons who took part in the clean - up operation at the GPE nuclear disaster site . Their claims were granted by domestic courts .
CARDINAL . Further developments in their cases are summarised in the Appendix .
